com.ltsllc.miranda.property

Class MirandaProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ltsllc.miranda.property.MirandaProperties

  • public class MirandaProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    The Miranda system's properties.

    This class is a SingleFile object that knows a lot about Properties objects.
